Description:
JHET 240222/01 - 312327057
easonably practicable measures have not been taken to mitigate the detrimental effects of an explosion, in that accumulation of settled dust on surfaces and structures throughout the compound plant has been allowed to build up and may create conditions for a secondary explosion

JHET 240222/01 - 312327093
Exposure of employees to substances hazardous to health, namely calcium carbonate, calcium stearate and polyvinylchloride dusts, has not been prevented or adequately controlled.
